details: Developed a hardware testing automation tool for embedded systems using Robot Framework, enabling continuous, repeatable test execution without manual intervention.
Programmed and optimized firmware for 3D printers using Marlin and OctoPrint; integrated TMC2209 stepper drivers for improved motion control.
Designed and 3D-printed 8 functional hardware prototypes, including precision fixtures and mounts for embedded testing workflows.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to accelerate deployment cycles and maintain consistent software delivery across test environments.
Created a Gmail Add-on using Google Apps Script and OpenAI API for real-time invoice parsing and categorization, reducing manual workload.
Built a cloud-native access control system deployed on Google Cloud Run with Firestore backend, scalable to 1,000+ users and multiple devices.
Modernized internal tools, reducing development and setup time by 50% through system refactoring and automation.
Improved backend scalability and API integration for seamless connection with various access control devices.
Completed daily delivery routes with approximately 250 parcels, maintaining a 95% on-time rate and high customer satisfaction.
Enhanced communication and German language skills through daily face-to-face customer interactions.

projects.title: CAN and OBD Reader for BMW
projects.description: Developed a real-time vehicle diagnostics tool using Python to monitor up to 6 CAN and OBD parameters simultaneously. Created a live data visualization dashboard with Angular and Node.js to assist in automotive fault detection.

projects.title: LogistiX: Factory Builder Unity Game
projects.description: Built a 3D factory automation game in Unity using C#, implementing 11 crafting recipes and 3 production machines. Designed and textured 3D assets in Blender to ensure a cohesive and immersive gameplay experience.

projects.title: Dynamic CV Generator
projects.description: Created a tool for efficiently customizing resumes to job descriptions streamlining CV tailoring for users. This CV PDF was generated using the tool, and a live demo is available on my GitHub page.
